channel.description: Week 7 Announcements This Week Mon: Lab 6 Due 7 PM Wed: Week 6 Response 11:59 PM Wed: Week 7 Questions 11:59 PM Thur: Speaker: Hunter Guthrie 3:30 PM Fri: Final Project Proposal 11:59 PM Next Week: Lab 7 Monday 7 PM Lab 6 Grading Windows File Server Ubuntu File Server Windows Web Application Cloud Web Application Lab 7 Backup & Restore Monitoring DevOps Speaker: Hunter Guthrie Plant System Administrator Evergy - Wolf Creek Former CIS 527 Student Highly Secure Industry Final Project Build Something or Fix Something Web Resource for New Startup Set up Laptops for a School Design Central Auth for Company Thin Clients vs.
